string.name: note
string.p: For decryption, the input must not contain any letter and all numbers in the input must be between 1 and 26.
For encryption, the input must not contain any number.

resources.string: Note: For Vigenere cipher, the keyword is compulsory and the keyword must contain letter only.
There are 3 additional ciphers that were used in the Gravity Falls series and the Journal 3, besides 5 main ciphers (Caesar, Atbash, A1Z26, Combined and Vigenere).
For more information about ciphers, visit this website
Note: For decryption, the input should only contain 0 and 1 and the length of the input must be a multiple of 8.
Note: For decryption, the input should only contain numbers from 0 to 9 and letter a, b, c, d, e, f and the length of the input must be a multiple of 2
Note: For decryption, the input should only contain -, ., / and space character.
